name: dubai-sme-scraper
title: Dubai SME Business Scraper
description: A comprehensive Apify actor that scrapes Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) in Dubai from Google Maps, categorizes them, and automatically stores the data in Google Sheets. Features advanced data processing, error handling, and production-ready scalability.
